member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.AllFields
member.summary: Used in a query to specify that all the fields be returned from the data source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.AllFields.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.AllFields.IncludeHiddenFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether hidden fields are included in the query.
member.returns: true if hidden fields are included in the query; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Authentication
member.summary: The Authentication class represents the authentication mode that is used to connect to the back-end server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Authentication.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Authentication.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A string that contains the ID.
A string that specifies the password.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Authentication.Authentications
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentications specified in the authentication header.
member.returns: A System.Xml.XmlElement array that specifies the authentications.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ColumnMappingType
member.summary: Indicates the type of XML format used for data returned in a query.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ColumnMappingType.Element
member.summary: Element-centric.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ColumnMappingType.Attribute
member.summary: Attribute-centric.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Connection
member.summary: Represents a connection to a data retrieval service adapter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Connection.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Connection.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A string that contains the connection string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Connection.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string for the connection.
member.returns: A string that contains the connection string.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DataRoot
member.summary: Represents the root of the content document for a particular adapter instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DataRoot.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DataRoot.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified data root.
member.param: A string that specifies the data root.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DataRoot.AllowRemoteDataAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the adapter accesses data that resides on a different server.
member.returns: true if the adapter is allowed to attempt access to remote data using the credentials supplied by the client; otherwise, false. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DataRoot.Root
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that identifies the data root for a particular adapter instance.
member.returns: A string that specifies the data root. In the case of a Microsoft SQL Server adapter, this property contains the SQL Server name. In the case of a Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services adapter, this property contains the URL for the SharePoint site.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DocumentType
member.summary: Specifies the document type for a request.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DocumentType.Content
member.summary: Service-specific document that represents data stored in the back-end data source. The schema for this document is a function of the schema of the data source. For example, in the case of the adapter service for Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services, the content document represents data stored on the SharePoint Web site where the service instance resides.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DocumentType.System
member.summary: Service-specific document that contains system data. Clients may query the system document using standard methods to obtain data about the service, including supported authentication modes, the data root format of the adapter, supported query types, and version support.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery
member.summary: Defines the filter used in a query against a data source provider.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.Fields
member.summary: Gets or sets the fields that are included in the query.
member.returns: A object that contains the fields.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.OrderBy
member.summary: Gets or sets the columns by which the data returned is ordered.
member.returns: An array of objects representing the columns.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.RowLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets a limit for the number of rows returned in the query.
member.returns: A 64-bit integer that specifies the row limit.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.ServerParameterInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets server parameter information in a query.
member.returns: A object that contains the server parameter information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.ServerParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the server parameters required by the data source in the query.
member.returns: A array that contains the server parameters.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DspQuery.WhereCondition
member.summary: Gets or sets the Where clause used in the filter for the query.
member.returns: A System.Xml.XmlNode object that contains the Where clause used in the query in the following form: Copy Code<Where> <And> <Or> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="Region"/> <Value>BC</Value> </Eq> <Eq> <FieldRef Name="Region"/> <Value>OR</Value> </Eq> </Or> <IsNotNull> <FieldRef Name="Phone"/> </IsNotNull> </And> </Where>

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery
member.summary: Represents a query used by a data retrieval service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ColumnMapping
member.summary: Gets or sets the XML format that is used for data returned in the query.
member.returns: A value that specifies the XML format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ComparisonLocale
member.summary: Gets or sets the locale that the server uses for string comparisons.
member.returns: A string that contains the locale ID (LCID).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.DspQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the filter, column selection, sorting, and row limit used in the query.
member.returns: A object that specifies the filter, column selection, sorting, and row limit.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.HasStartPosition
member.summary: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the property has been set.
member.returns: true if the property has been set; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ResultContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of content that is returned through the query.
member.returns: A value that specifies the type of content. The default value is Both.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ResultNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the namespace to use on the query result.
member.returns: A string that specifies the namespace.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ResultPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets a prefix for the result namespace.
member.returns: A string that contains the prefix.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ResultRoot
member.summary: Gets or sets the root name for the XML payload.
member.returns: A string that contains the root name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.ResultRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a row element name for the XML payload.
member.returns: A string that specifies the row element name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.Select
member.summary: Gets or sets an XPath expression that specifies the data item that the client is querying against.
member.returns: A string that contains the XPath expression that specifies the data item. This value may be a non-row-returning item, such as a Microsoft SQL Server database or a Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services site, in which the query is a metadata query; or a row-returning item such as a SQL Server table or a Windows SharePoint Services view, in which case the query is a data query.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DSQuery.StartPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that identifies the beginning of the next page when paging is supported by the data retrieval service.
member.returns: A string that identifies the beginning of the next page.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field
member.summary: Represents a single column in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified column name and column display name.
member.param: A string that contains the name of the column.
A string that contains the display name of the column.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field.Alias
member.summary: Gets or sets the display name of the column.
member.returns: A string that contains the display name of the column.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the column.
member.returns: A string that contains the name of the column.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields
member.summary: Represents the collection of columns that are included in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields.#ctor(Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.AllFields)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that includes all the columns in a Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services list.
member.param: A object that specifies all the columns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields.#ctor(Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Field[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified collection of columns.
member.param: An array of objects that specifies the columns.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields.AllFields
member.summary: Gets or sets all columns included in the query.
member.returns: A object that represents all the columns.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Fields.FieldArray
member.summary: Gets or sets the columns included in a query.
member.returns: An array of objects that represents the columns.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter
member.summary: Provides a COM interface for clients to access a data retrieval service adapter locally.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.Authentication
member.summary: Gets or sets the authentication mode that is used to connect to the back-end server.
member.returns: An object that specifies the authentication mode. When query execution finishes, this property contains the actual authentication method used to access the back-end server by the adapter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.Connection
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection to the data retrieval service adapter.
member.returns: A object that represents the connection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.DataRoot
member.summary: Gets or sets the root of a particular data source.
member.returns: A object that represents the root of the data source. The root format can be one of the following three forms: a server name, a UNC share, or a URL. When query execution finishes, the adapter resets this property to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.LocalClient
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the client is a server component that loads the adapter through the object model interface of the adapter.
member.returns: true if the client is a server component that loads the adapter through the object model interface. The default value is false, indicating that the request arrives through SOAP.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.Query(Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest)
member.summary: Executes a query expressed as a predefined request object.
member.returns: A object that contains the data in response to the request query.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.Request
member.summary: Gets or sets the operation type and the document type of the query.
member.returns: A object that specifies the operation type and the document type of the query. The only supported operation type is query. The document type can be either content or system.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.IDspAdapter.Versions
member.summary: Gets or sets the versions of the data retrieval service that are supported by the adapter or the versions being used by the client to query against the service.
member.returns: A object that specifies the versions of the data retrieval service. When query execution finishes, this property contains the versions supported by the adapter.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.MethodType
member.summary: Specifies the action of the request.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.MethodType.Query
member.summary: Represents a query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderDirection
member.summary: The OrderDirection enumeration specifies the direction in which a field or column is sorted.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderDirection.ASC
member.summary: Specifies ascending sort.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderDirection.DESC
member.summary: Specifies descending sort.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderField
member.summary: Represents the column by which the result is ordered.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderField.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderField.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderDirection)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified column name and sort direction.
member.param: A string that contains the name of the column.
A value that specifies the sort direction.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderField.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the sort direction for the column by which the result is ordered.
member.returns: A value that specifies the sort direction.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.OrderField.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the column by which the result is ordered.
member.returns: A string that contains the name of the column.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PagingSupportType
member.summary: Indicates the type of paging that is supported for a query.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PagingSupportType.None
member.summary: Indicates paging is not supported.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PagingSupportType.ForwardOnly
member.summary: Indicates paging only moves forward.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PagingSupportType.TwoWay
member.summary: Indicates paging can move forward or backward.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PTQuery
member.summary: Represents a pass-through query.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.PTQuery.Any
member.summary: Gets or sets a placeholder where the content of the pass-through query is specified.
member.returns: A System.Xml.XmlNode array whose structure each adapter defines.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest
member.summary: Represents the request in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest.DSQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the data retrieval service query for the request.
member.returns: A object that represents the query.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest.PTQuery
member.summary: Gets or sets the pass-through query for the request.
member.returns: A object that represents the pass-through query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryResponse
member.summary: Represents the response in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryResponse.DSResponse
member.summary: Gets or sets the response for the data retrieval service query.
member.returns: A object that represents the response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryResponse.PTResponse
member.summary: Gets or sets the response for the pass-through query.
member.returns: A object that represents the response.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryType
member.summary: Specifies a type of query that is used in a request.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryType.DSPQ
member.summary: Specifies data retrieval service query format.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryType.PassThrough
member.summary: Specifies Pass-Through query format.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Request
member.summary: Represents the request header in a query, containing information about the operation type and the document type of the query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Request.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Request.Select
member.summary: Gets or sets an XPath expression that specifies the data item that the client is querying against.
member.returns: A string that contains the XPath expression that specifies the data item. This value may be a non-row-returning item, such as a Microsoft SQL Server database or a Microsoft Windows SharePoint Services site, in which the query is a metadata query; or a row-returning item such as a SQL Server table or a Windows SharePoint Services view, in which case the query is a data query.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.RequestHeader
member.summary: Represents the request header in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.RequestHeader.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.RequestHeader.#ctor(Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.DocumentType,Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.MethodType)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified document type and action.
member.param: A value that specifies the document type.
A value that specifies the action.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.RequestHeader.Document
member.summary: Gets or sets the document type of the request.
member.returns: A value that specifies the document type.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.RequestHeader.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the action of the request.
member.returns: A value that specifies the action of the request.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response
member.summary: Represents the response in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified XML data.
member.param: A string that contains the XML data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response.DataXml
member.summary: Gets or sets the XML data of the response.
member.returns: A string that contains the XML data in the following form: If the schema was requested in the property, the first top-level element is the XML schema (XSD), starting with the <schema> element.If the data was requested in the ResultContent property, the next top-level element is the data.The final top-level element is the pagingInfo element, which corresponds to the PagingInfo block. The XML string can then be set to the startPosition property to get the next page of data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response.ErrorCode
member.summary: Gets or sets an error message for the response.
member.returns: A string that contains the error message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Response.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the response status of the query.
member.returns: A value that specifies the response status.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResponseStatus
member.summary: Specifies the status of a query response.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResponseStatus.Success
member.summary: Indicates the query succeeded.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResponseStatus.Failure
member.summary: Indicates the query failed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResultContentType
member.summary: Indicates the type of content that is returned through a query.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResultContentType.Both
member.summary: Returns both the schema (XSD) and XML payload parts of the query result.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResultContentType.SchemaOnly
member.summary: Returns only the schema (XSD) part of the query result.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ResultContentType.DataOnly
member.summary: Returns only the XML payload part of the query result.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter
member.summary: Represents a server parameter required by the server containing the data source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified parameter name, parameter value, and a Boolean value specifying whether the value of the parameter is null.
member.param: A string that contains the name of the parameter.
A string that contains the value of the parameter.
true to specify that the value of the parameter is null; false to specify that the value of the server parameter be interpreted as an empty string ("").

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the server parameter.
member.returns: A string that contains the name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter.Null
member.summary: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the value of the server parameter is null.
member.returns: true to specify that the value of the parameter is null; false to specify that the value of the server parameter will be interpreted as an empty string ("").

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameter.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the server parameter.
member.returns: A string that contains the value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameterInfo
member.summary: Represents information about the parameters used by the server containing the data source.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.ServerParameterInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Versions
member.summary: Represents the versions of the data retrieval service that are supported by an adapter or the versions being used in a query.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Versions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Versions.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class based on the specified version.
member.param: A string array that specifies the version of the data retrieval service.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.Versions.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a version within the collection of versions supported by the data retrieval service adapter.
member.returns: A string array that contains the version information.
